CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 24, 1945, pg. 13, reads: "Organ Grinder - Albert Abernathy, legless organ grinder, smiles his appreciation as a spectator 'feeds the kitty.' Note the excellent study in facial expressions.  Each person vividly shows his or her emotions or reaction to his playing.  Abernathy, though legless, has traveled extensively in spite of his handicap. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Woman giving money to organ grinder Albert Abernathy, surrounded by children, on sidewalk in front of Kingsberg's Cleaners, Centre Avenue, Hill District
